data.expected_result: There should be big warnings about running copying/pasting stuff into console
data.short_description: On Electron 3.0.3/Canary 0.0.215 there is no warnings in console anymore about running stuff in console
data.steps_to_repro: - Be on Electron 3.0.3/Canary 0.0.215/0.0.195/0.0.55 - Open the dev console with CTRL + SHIFT + I (CMD + SHIFT + I on macOS) - Observe there is no warnings at all about running stuff in console (the warning to stop social engineering)
